name: poseidon2-circom
description: Poseidon2 hash algorithm implementation in Circom with Groth16 proof system

scripts.setup: cd build && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup-circuit: cd build && snarkjs groth16 setup simple_poseidon2.r1cs pot12_final.ptau simple_poseidon2_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute simple_poseidon2_0000.zkey simple_poseidon2_0001.zkey --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey simple_poseidon2_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.witness: cd build && node simple_poseidon2_js/generate_witness.js simple_poseidon2_js/simple_poseidon2.wasm ../input.json witness.wtns
scripts.prove: cd build && snarkjs groth16 prove simple_poseidon2_0001.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: cd build && snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.full-test: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run setup-circuit && npm run test && npm run witness && npm run prove && npm run verify && npm run verify-system
